title: “蛸苇废船”艺作集
content:
我画了几幅有关由[[*user KanKan]]先生设计的的次要相关组织“[http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/system:page-tags/tag/%E8%9B%B8%E8%8B%87%E5%BA%9F%E8%88%B9#pages 蛸苇废船]”相关物的艺术作品。

__※预定随时追加（随今后新作品的增加）__
　
　
　
　
　
　
　
　
　
-----
　
**太阳蛸**
　
[[=image http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/local--files/takoashi-haisen-artworks/%E5%A4%AA%E9%99%BD%E8%9B%B8.png width="Xpx" height="Xpx" style="border: 2px solid white; padding: 0em;"]]

＊[[[SCP-1808-JP]]] Written by:[[*user KanKan]]
＊Illustrated by:[[*user ToufuInTheBox]]

CC BY-SA 3.0
　
　
　
　
　
-----
　
**梦幻蛸**
　
[[=image http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/local--files/takoashi-haisen-artworks/%E5%A4%A2%E5%B9%BB%E8%9B%B8.png width="Xpx" height="Xpx" style="border: 2px solid white; padding: 0em;"]]
　
[[collapsible show="▶︎【略有差异版（背景不同）】" hide="▶︎【关闭】"]]
[[=image http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/local--files/takoashi-haisen-artworks/%E5%A4%A2%E5%B9%BB%E8%9B%B8%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86.png width="Xpx" height="Xpx" style="border: 2px solid white; padding: 0em;"]]
[[/collapsible]]
　
＊[[[SCP-1587-JP]]] Written by:[[*user KanKan]]
＊Illustrated by:[[*user ToufuInTheBox]]

CC BY-SA 3.0
　
　
　
　
　
-----
　
**鹦鹉螺和猫**
　
[[=image http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/local--files/takoashi-haisen-artworks/%E3%83%8E%E3%83%BC%E3%83%81%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B9%E3%81%A8%E7%8C%AB.png width="Xpx" height="Xpx" style="border: 2px solid white; padding: 0em;"]]
　
[[collapsible show="▶︎【略有差异版（只有鹦鹉螺）】" hide="▶︎【关闭】"]]
[[=image http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/local--files/takoashi-haisen-artworks/%E3%83%8E%E3%83%BC%E3%83%81%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B9%E3%81%A0%E3%81%91.png width="Xpx" height="Xpx" style="border: 2px solid white; padding: 0em;"]]
[[/collapsible]]
　
＊[[[SCP-083-JP]]] Written by:[[*user kyougoku08]]
＊Illustrated by:[[*user ToufuInTheBox]]

CC BY-SA 3.0

author: Ylumwlne
